verses.verse: Moreover you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet:<s%> <S%H8438><s%> with <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> them.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> shall be <S%H8083>eight<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> one of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

The <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be <S%H2266>coupled<s%> together <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another;<s%> and other <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> from the <S%H7098>selvedge<s%> in the <S%H2279>coupling;<s%> and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H7020>uttermost<s%> <S%H8193>edge<s%> of another <S%H3407>curtain,<s%> in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%> of the <S%H8145>second.<s%>

<S%H2572>Fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain,<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%> of the <S%H8145>second;<s%> that the <S%H3924>loops<s%> may <S%H6901>take<s%> <S%H6901>hold<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> of <S%H269>another.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> together with the <S%H7165>clasps:<s%> and it shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair to be a <S%H168>covering<s%> on the <S%H4908>tabernacle:<s%> <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make.<s%>

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> shall be <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of one <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and the <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be all of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

And you shall <S%H2266>couple<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and shall <S%H3717>double<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> in the <S%H4136>forefront<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is <S%H7020>outmost<s%> in the <S%H2279>coupling,<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> in the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> which <S%H2279>couples<s%> the <S%H8145>second.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H7165>clasps<s%> into the <S%H3924>loops,<s%> and <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> together, that it may be <S%H259>one.<s%>

And the <S%H5629>remnant<s%> that <S%H5736>remains<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that <S%H5736>remains,<s%> shall <S%H5628>hang<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H268>backside<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And a <S%H520>cubit<s%> on the one side, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> on the <S%H2088>other<s%> side of that which <S%H5736>remains<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> it shall <S%H1961>hang<s%> <S%H5628><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6654>sides<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> side and on that side, to <S%H3680>cover<s%> it.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H352>rams'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> and a <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins.<s%>
And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> up.

<S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> of a <S%H7175>board,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> shall be the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

<S%H8147>Two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%> shall there be in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> <S%H7947>set<s%> in <S%H7947>order<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H269>another:<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>
And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons.<s%>
And for the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> there shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards:<s%>

And their <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>
And for the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7175>boards.<s%>
And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> for the <S%H4742>corners<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> in the two <S%H3411>sides.<s%>

And they shall be <S%H8382>coupled<s%> together <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> and they shall be <S%H8535>coupled<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of it to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2885>ring:<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> shall it be for them <S%H8147>both;<s%> they shall be for the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4742>corners.<s%>

And they shall be <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7175>boards,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H134>sockets;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood;<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%>

And <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> for the two <S%H3411>sides<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%>
And the <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H1280>bar<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H7175>boards<s%> shall <S%H1272>reach<s%> from <S%H7097>end<s%> to <S%H7097>end.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> their <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H1280>bars:<s%> and you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And you shall <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> according to the <S%H4941>fashion<s%> thereof <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H7200>showed<s%> you in the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> of <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work:<s%> with <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>made:<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>hang<s%> it on <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> wood <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold:<s%> their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> shall be of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>hang<s%> up the <S%H6532>veil<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> that you may <S%H935>bring<s%> in <S%H8033>thither<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony:<s%> and the <S%H6532>veil<s%> shall <S%H914>divide<s%> to you <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place and the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>
And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat on the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.

And you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> <S%H5227>over<s%> <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south:<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6763>side.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H4639>worked<s%> with <S%H4639>needlework.<s%> <S%H7551><s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> wood, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> shall be of <S%H2091>gold:<s%> and you shall <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> for them.
